CHAT.comment: STATE OF KANSAS, Plaintiff, v. STATE OF COLORADO
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN B. DRAPER ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFF
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY P. MINEAR ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS INTERVENOR
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID W. ROBBINS ON BEHALF OF THE DEFENDANT
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
